bibl.title: Poetae Comici Graeci (PCG). Vol. V. Damoxenus - Magnes.
bibl.seg: Kassel Rudolf et Colin Austin, Poetae Comici Graeci (PCG). Vol. V. Damoxenus - Magnes.
Berlin - New York, W. de Gruyter, 1986, 8°, xxxii-640 pp.

C.R. par Alain Blanchard, REG 103 (1990) pp. 323-324. - Vittorio Citti, GIF 39 (1987) pp. 239-241. - Thomas Gelzer, MusHelv 46 (1989) p. 248. - R.L. Hunger CR N.S., 38 (1988) pp. 14-15. - Wolfgang Luppe, JHS 109 (1989) pp. 228-229. - Hans-Joachim Newiger, Gnomon 61 (1989) pp. 1-19. - J.Th.M.F. Pieters, Mnemosyne 4e s., 45 (1992) pp. 100-102. - Peter Rau, GGA 241 (1989) pp. 5-12. - Herman Van Looy, AntCl 57 (1988) pp. 343-344. - André Wankenne, EtCl (1987) p. 436. - Bernhard Zimmermann, Gymnasium 95 (1988) pp. 275-276.
